name: Qiqi
desc: Bubu Eczanesinde talebe ve otacı. Kemik beyazı tene sahip bir ölümsüz. Pek konuşmaz ve duygularını belli etmez.

videoCollection.title: 원신 | 오색 연과 봄바람 이벤트 애니메이션 컷신-「바람에 묻는 연」
원신｜신규 캐릭터 플레이-「치치: 돌고 도는 한빙」

desc.text:
Due to being a zombie, Qiqi lacks facial expression. She hopes that's okay.
She may look like a zombie, but she's surprisingly limber due to a strict calisthenics regimen.
Her memory is poor. She forgets easily, and that is partly why she can seem cold to others.
Her appearance is forever frozen at the point of her passing, so estimates of her age are unreliable.
Zombies require orders to act, but due to some reason or another, Qiqi is presently giving herself orders.

Usually, zombies are cold and stiff, which forces them to locomote by hopping about.
As such, Qiqi keeps up a calisthenics regimen to retain a human-like form.
The 77th-generation Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, Hu Tao, doesn't see the point of all this. Whenever she meets Qiqi, she will say: "It would be easier if you just let me bury you."
Qiqi, of course, has no wish to be buried, and so conducts her exercises at night when no one's about.
Qiqi's memory falls far behind those of non-undead disposition.
If she does not continue to reinforce her impressions of someone, she will completely forget them in three days tops.
But who knows, this might be a good thing — for a person with painful memories, forgetting may, in fact, be a form of release.
The person Qiqi must remember most... not only does this person have a very punch-able face, but she also shows up every single day.
As such, Qiqi isn't too concerned about her poor memory.

Qiqi is very petite indeed, but is in fact a very powerful zombie. Her short stature is hardly any impediment, but is instead good for high-speed movement.
In combat, Qiqi will unleash the self-control that she usually maintains, allowing her body to return to an undead state, increasing her strength and speed.
"You're dead."
Once she has stoically defeated her enemies, Qiqi will once again get her muscles under control, returning to her normal state.
She has been threatened in the past by Treasure Hoarders while picking herbs by herself.
Now, a little girl, all by herself, seems like an easy target, no?
Who would have thought that this girl could send a whole crew flying?
This is why we should always remember never to judge a person based on appearances. Or a zombie, for that matter.

Zombies mostly require orders from the person who awakens them to move. But strictly speaking, Qiqi has never been awakened.
As such, she counts as a very rare case of a zombie that gives itself orders.
If these orders are simple ones like "defeat the enemy," Qiqi has no problem fulfilling them.
But when faced with complex instructions such as "go to Jueyun Karst, climb the sheer rock faces and pick herbs," Qiqi sometimes winds up stuck below the cliffs, unable to give up no matter how many times she tries and fails to scale the cliff.
The method to cancel her orders is very simple — hug Qiqi from behind, tell her something like "I love you the most," and the orders will dissipate, just like that.
Unfortunately, there's just no element of sincerity when Baizhu does it, leading to greatly reduced results.
Perhaps someday, someone will come along who understands that such words cannot be spoken lightly, and who slowly but carefully releases the hold that Qiqi's orders have over her...
What will Qiqi's response be then?

This ancient story has long been forgotten by mortals.
An ordinary herb-picking lass named Qiqi lost her way and trespassed the realm of the adepti. Injuring her right leg in a fall, she hurriedly hid in a cavern to rest.
Even occupied as she was in bandaging her wound, she could hear sounds that did not belong to the mortal plane. But she could have never expected that with a huge crash, she would forever be trapped between life and death.
Whether adepti or demons, just or wicked, all understood that she was an innocent mortal caught in the crossfire.
Or perhaps it was by the will of heaven that she received a Vision in her dying moments, and so ended this contention between adepti and demon.
The adepti could not bear to let her die, and each imparted to her a portion of their strength, meaning to breathe life back into her body.
Qiqi did indeed awaken and live again, but went into a berserk state, unable to control the adepti energy raging through her.
Seeking to end the disturbance, Mountain Shaper had no choice but to seal the hapless maiden in amber.

After hundreds of years, Qiqi was discovered by humans, still trapped in the amber, and was brought to Wangsheng Funeral Parlor for burial.
The mountain roads were treacherous, however, and the amber was bumped about. Coupled with the passing of many years, the seal on Qiqi was all but spent.
She awakened in the middle of the night, broke the amber in secret, and fled.
Following the herb-picking habits of her previous life, Qiqi headed right for the hills.
By chance, she met Baizhu, the boss of Bubu Pharmacy, on the way, and he took her in.
Now, Baizhu was a doctor of great skill, but he was hardly a man of high caliber or great courage.
Even so, he took her in, never mind that her memory was so poor that she could not even sort herbs out.
It does seem that his acceptance of Qiqi has something to do with his own personal pursuits.
Qiqi is stiff, but not slow, and has long realized this. However, she does not take it to heart.
Perhaps she has seen too much, or been alone for too long... But what remains true is that she treasures his concern, even if there is some other motive behind it.

story.title: A Home-and-Away Handbook of Practical Wisdom for the Undead

desc.text:
Qiqi carries something with her that looks like a notebook.
Qiqi's memory is very poor, so it is an object of irreplaceable importance if she is to smoothly go about her daily life.
The words within are written in a centuries-old style, and are very elegant indeed.
The first page is an instructional on calisthenics.
Moving past that, one finds the descriptions of various herbs and some "orders."
Qiqi needs to give herself orders, so she has very precise instructions to ensure smooth transition.
She has also dutifully written down all the things she needs to do in a day.
Recently, she has also added a section on "brain training" and "mnemonic methods."
At this point, it has become a true "dummy's guide" on just about anything.
But if the day ever comes when Qiqi also forgets to look at her notebook... there would truly be nothing for it then.

Qiqi's Vision was given to her in the last moment of her life.
She wanted to stop the clock from turning. She wanted to live happily again.
She feared death. She wanted to live. She missed her family... These feelings coalesced at last into "ice."
"If only I could freeze time... How wonderful would that be?"
As she thought thus, tears fell from the moribund girl's eyes upon the Vision that had appeared before her.
The mighty and illuminated adepti all acknowledged this as a legitimate form of "illumination" — the yearning of humanity for bygone days is, after all, a desire to protect that past.

customize.text: Karakter Tanıtımı

Sumeru Akademisi'nden yüzyılların dehası olarak mezun olan Lisa, şimdilerde Favonius Şövalyelerinin Kütüphanecisi olarak çalışıyor. Çalışıyor demek biraz komik kaçabilir, çünkü bulduğu her fırsatta işten kaytarıyor. Ancak dikkatli olun ve asla Lisa'yı küçük görmeyin, ayrıca her zaman ödünç aldığınız kitapları zamanında geri verin. Yoksa Lisa, sizi "şok edici" şekilde aniden ziyaret eder.
Yetenek Önizlemesi

Lisa, <color=#ffd780>Element Patlaması</color> üzerinde yoğunlaşan ve <color=#ffd780>Element Becerisiyle</color> tonla <color=#ffd780>Hasar</color> verebilen bir karakterdir. <color=#ffd780>Normal Saldırıları</color> bazı takımlarda çok yararlı olabilir.
<color=#ffd780>Element Ustalığı</color> ile yükseldiği için önerilen takımlar <color=#ffacff>Şiddetlenme</color> , <color=#ffacff>Elektrik Yüklemesi</color> veya <color=#99ff88>Aşırı Çiçeklenme</color> tepkimeleri üzerinde yoğunlaşan takımlardır. Yüksek <color=#ffd780>Element Ustalığı</color> , <color=#ffd780>Kritik Hasar</color> ve <color=#ffd780>Enerji Yüklemesi</color> ile takımınız için çok güçlü ve yararlı bir karakter olabilir.
Ayrıca <color=#ffacff>Pasif Yeteneği Statik Elektrik Akımı</color> sayesinde <color=#ffd780>Element Patlamasının Hasar</color> vermesiyle düşmanların savunmasını azaltarak tüm takımın düşmanlara daha fazla <color=#ffd780>Hasar</color> vermesini sağlar.
Bazı önerilen takımlar aşağıda verilmiştir:

customize.name: Lisa
customize.desc: Sumeru Akedemisi tarafından son iki yüzyılın en seçkin mezunu olarak kabul edilen Favonius Şövalyelerinin tembel ama bilgili Kütüphanecisi.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc: Kendisine "Adalet Prensesi" diyen ve Oz adında bir gece kuzgunu ile seyahat eden gizemli bir kız.

customize.name: Sucrose
customize.desc: Her şey hakkında meraklı bir simyager. Biyo-Simya üzerine araştırma yapar.

customize.name: Gezgin (Doğa)
customize.desc: Ailesinden geriye kalan son kişi elinden alındığı için Yedileri bulmak üzere bir yolculuğa çıkan, başka dünyadan gelen bir gezgin.

customize.text: <color=#ffacff>Şiddetlenme</color> tepkimesi üzerine yoğunlaşan bir takım. Sucrose yerine Kazuha, Gezgin (Doğa) yerine Nahida ve Fischl yerine Yae Miko kullanılabilir.

Aynı elemente sahip her bir takım arkadaşı için ise fazladan <color=#ffd780>Element Ustalığı</color> kazanır. <color=#ffd780>Element Ustalığı</color>
4 Parça Set

Set Bonusları
• Element Ustalığı +80
• Element Tepkimeleri Element Ustalığını/Saldırıyı artırır.
Bu set <color=#ffd780>Element Ustalığını</color> artırarak <color=#ffd780>Element Tepkime Hasarını</color> artırır. Ayrıca tepkileri tetiklemek, Lisa'nın <color=#ffd780>Element Ustalığını/Saldırı</color> 'sını artırır. <color=#ffacff>Şiddetlenme</color> <color=#ffffff73>,</color> <color=#ffacff>Elektrik Yüklemesi</color> <color=#ffffff73>ve</color> <color=#99ff88>Aşırı Çiçeklenme</color> takımları için idealdir.

Set Bonusları
• Enerji Yüklemesi +20%
• Enerji Yüklemesine bağlı olarak Element Patlaması Hasarını artırır.
Bu set <color=#ffd780>Enerji Yüklemesi</color> sağlar ve <color=#ffd780>Enerji Yüklemesi</color> oranına bağlı olarak (%300'e kadar) <color=#ffd780>Element Patlamasının Hasarını</color> artırır. Bu set, Lisa'ya daha fazla <color=#ffd780>Element Patlaması</color> kullanması için yardımcı olabilir.

Set Bonusları
• Elektrik Dayanıklılığı +40%
• Elektrik uygulanmış düşmanlara karşı Hasar artar.
Bu set, <color=#ffacff>Elektrik</color> uygulanmış düşmanlara karşı olan Hasarı artırır. <color=#ffacff>Tek Elektrik</color> takımları için ve bazı <color=#ffacff>Şiddetlenme</color> takımları için önerilebilir.

Set Bonusları
• Elektrik Hasarı Bonusu +15%
• Elektrik kaynaklı tepkimelerin Hasarını artırır ve Elektrik kaynaklı Element Tepkimesi gerçekleştirilirse Element Becerisinin süresini 1 saniye azaltır.
Bu set, <color=#ffacff>Elektrik Hasarı Bonusu</color> ve <color=#ffacff>Elektrik</color> kaynaklı <color=#ffd780>Element Tepkimelerinin Hasarını</color> artırır. <color=#ffacff>Şiddetlenme</color> takımları için önerilir.
2 Parça + 2 Parça Bonusları

Set Bonusları
• Element Ustalığı +80
• Saldırı +18%
• Enerji Yüklemesi +20%
• Element Patlaması Hasarı +20%
Bu 2 Parça + 2 Parça kombinasyonları, 4 Parça Yadigar toplayana kadar iyi seçeneklerdir. <color=#ffd780>Element Ustalığı</color> veren 2 Parça Bonusları yalnızca <color=#ffacff>Şiddetlenme</color> takımlarında kullanılmalıdır.

reliquarySetEffect.fourSetEffect: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

dropMaterial.name: Rüya Çözücü
dropMaterial.desc:
An item capable of changing Character Level-Up Materials obtained from memories and trials into whatever form is needed.
People once believed that spirits and memories had some material form. If someone dreamed of heaven before waking up clutching a flower, then that blossom must have been made from such a fantasy. Dream Solvent dissolves that which is obtained from memory and transforms it into some other dream.
Indeed, blows traded with the strong are stepping stones towards becoming stronger yourself.

dropMaterial.name: Kuzey Diyarı Yay Prototipi
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Kuzey Diyarı Katalizör Prototipi
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Kuzey Diyarı Çift Elli Kılıç Prototipi
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Kuzey Diyarı Mızrak Prototipi
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Kuzey Diyarı Kılıç Prototipi
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Göklerdeki Tekboynuz Hazinesi
dropMaterial.desc:
The horn of a whale that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is said that the shape of one's constellation determines one's character. The image of a whale cruising across the celestial heights represents a solipsism that seeks to crush and devour all in its path.
Embracing this aspect of himself, Childe gleefully summoned one such beast before throwing himself into battle against you.

dropMaterial.name: İblis Parçası
dropMaterial.desc:
The shard of a weapon that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is stained with a profound color that is not of this world, no doubt due to the land of endless darkness that the young boy saw with his own two eyes.
Perhaps it has nothing to do with the power of a Delusion, but as they say, the weapon reflects its user...

dropMaterial.name: Savaşçının Gölgesi
dropMaterial.desc:
A fragment of power that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is the product of a will to fight that has been honed over countless slaughters.
If humans do indeed have destinies, then his must surely have been twisted by such deeds. Why else, then, would he always be at the heart of every conflict?

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazuriti Tozu
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazuriti Kırıntısı
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazuriti Parçası
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazuriti Külçesi
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Ametisti Tozu
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Ametisti Kırıntısı
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Ametisti Parçası
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Ametisti Külçesi
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Yeşimi Tozu
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Yeşimi Kırıntısı
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Yeşimi Parçası
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Yeşimi Külçesi
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: I am Qiqi. I am a zombie. And I... forgot what comes next.

voice.title: Chat: Talking to Herself
voice.desc: Hey, do you know what? Uhh... neither do I. I... already forgot.

voice.title: Chat: Afraid of Heat
voice.desc: Let's go somewhere cooler.

voice.title: Chat: Training
voice.desc: One, two, three, four. Two, two, three, four...

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: I forgot my umbrella again.

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: I want to build a snowman. Will you help?

voice.title: When the Sun Is Out
voice.desc: I should have stayed indoors today.

voice.title: When It's Windy
voice.desc: The wind is... frigid. I like it.

voice.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
voice.desc: Hold my hand please. This wind could blow me away.

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Morning means it's time to check my diary. Because my diary reminds me what I'm supposed to do in the morning.

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: I just remembered something. I forgot to help Dr. Baizhu prepare medications.

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: Good evening. How was your day? My day was... fine, I think. But I can't remember.

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: It's time for you to sleep now. I will do my stretches. ...Do not watch me, please.

voice.title: About Qiqi
voice.desc: Did you ask me something? Sorry... I forgot.

voice.title: About Us: Memory
voice.desc: I have a poor memory for most things. But as far as I know, that doesn't matter.

voice.title: About Us: Memory Training
voice.desc: I started memory training exercises recently. So don't worry, I won't forget who you are.

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc: My Vision can't turn back time. But at least it gives me the power to protect the people that matter most.

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: I may be a corpse, but I am in a much better physical condition than Dr. Baizhu.

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: Sometimes I see finches near the pharmacy. A nice little group of finches.

voice.title: About Baizhu
voice.desc: I can never remember Dr. Baizhu's face. But I don't mind.

voice.title: About Hu Tao
voice.desc: Warm. Fake smile. Death. I despise Hu Tao.

voice.title: About Xiao: Name
voice.desc: Sounds like a historical artifact to me.

voice.title: About Xiao: Memory
voice.desc: Remind me, have I met him before?

voice.title: About Xinyan
voice.desc: ...Who?

voice.title: About Yaoyao
voice.desc: Cute. Like a nice little finch.

voice.title: About Dusky Ming
voice.desc: On some nights, I almost feel like someone is doing stretches together with me. But maybe I just have an overactive imagination.

voice.title: More About Qiqi: I
voice.desc: What's going on?

voice.title: More About Qiqi: II
voice.desc: I perform stretches regularly to help me maintain the same range of movement as a normal human being. But as soon as I stop doing them, the rigor mortis starts to set in again.

voice.title: More About Qiqi: III
voice.desc: Some people want to take advantage of me. Others are terrified of me. But you... You are not like any of those people.

voice.title: More About Qiqi: IV
voice.desc: Since we first met, I have had a warm feeling inside. Not the kind of warmth that makes me feel rotten and disgusting and closer to death. The other kind of warm. The one that happens inside my heart. Thank you. I am happy. Sadly I only recognize the current you. If I forget you... No. I will order myself to remember you.

voice.title: More About Qiqi: V
voice.desc: In the past, my only thought was: I must stay alive. Even though I didn't know what to live for. But now, I think I know. I want to live with you. I want to ask, can we always stay together, for the rest of life, until death? Yes or no? Yes? Is that your real answer? Good, excellent. I promise to always protect you.

voice.title: Qiqi's Hobbies
voice.desc: I want to have a pet. For example, a nice little finch.

voice.title: Qiqi's Troubles
voice.desc: I don't know why, but high temperatures make me feel... disgusting.

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: I like coconut milk... But, I don't know what it tastes like.

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: Sorry, I have no idea.

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Many happy returns. Here is a bag of herbal medicine for you. You must be very surprised that I remembered? Let me explain. Last time you told me, I wrote your birthday down on a piece of paper. If I look at something once a day, it eventually goes into my long-term memory, and it will stay there forever.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc: Now, I have more power. But... what does that mean? Please explain. Thank you.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc: Ah, I understand. When I get stronger, I need to put more effort into controlling my strength.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc: In the past, I did not understand the idea of being stronger than I already was. Now that I understand it well, I wish I was just a little stronger still.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc: All of this is because of you. Thank you very much. Can you make me a promise? From now on, please, let me protect you. Do you accept? Yes or no?

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: Wheel of life.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Life goes on.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Go.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: IV
voice.desc: Rise.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Orders given. Orders received.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Sacred name: Fortune Preserver.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Opening box of Adepti tricks.

voice.title: Sprint Start: I
voice.desc: Faster? Okay, faster.

voice.title: Deploying Wind Glider: I
voice.desc: Uh... Huh...

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: Ooh, pretty.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Treasure chests... hmm... do we like treasure chests?

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Wasn't there something in here a second ago...?

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Ow.

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: Oh no...

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: I must live on...

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: Don't want... to be sealed... back up...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: Cold... So cold...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: No...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: I didn't feel that.

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Wow.

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: II
voice.desc: Oh...

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: I'm here.

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: What's happening?

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: I will... bring my notebook.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Cold. I like it. But, no flavor...

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: It's burning my tongue...

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: Danger.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Stop. Let me do it.

desc.text: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.
Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Using <color=#ffd780>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

materials.name: Kırağı Çekirdeği
materials.desc:
The exposed core of a defeated Cryo Regisvine. Pure Cryo energy is contained within it.
Energy and thoughts that swell deep within the earth will eventually erupt on the surface. Even the deathly silent frost will attach to living things on the ground, turning even ordinary vegetation like vines into huge, vicious predators.

desc.text:
Your present? It tastes good. Thank you.
This coconut milk is different. Violetgrass, Berries... feels cool.
Birthday... Qiqi is spending it with you. Qiqi is very happy.
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1366961529783017475

I saw someone lying in the grass. I thought they needed help... Turns out it was just you.
Can you get up? Here, take my hand.
Yes, I'm going to gather some herbs. You... want to help me? Thank you.
But going up the mountain... isn't easy. How about I pick the herbs, and you just hold the basket?
HoYoLAB Article: https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/3640550

<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

materials.name: Refah Öğretisi
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the blessing of Liyue, it is the foundation of the great city built by the gods and the people of Liyue, and it is the source of the peace and safety of the land.

materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the promise made by Liyue to its children: To repay the hard-working laborers with enough gold to brighten up this land.

materials.name: Refah Felsefesi
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity is unmatched and unobtainable by any other nations — it all belongs to Liyue and its inhabitants.

materials.name: Lanetli Parşömen
materials.desc: A scroll inscribed with ancient images. It is said that few can decipher its meaning, and the few scholars that have all went mad.

materials.name: Poyraz'ın Kuyruğu
materials.desc:
A handful of tail scales from the Great Wolf King of the North.
Even without his physical body and beyond death, Boreas still possesses extraordinary powers. He took a form comprised of ice and wind to embrace a new challenge, but even such a form could not house all of his power. The ice scales that fell during the battle still retain some of their spiritual energy.

materials.name: Bilgelik Tacı
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.
<color=#ffd780>Herald of Frost</color>
·On hit, Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attacks regenerate HP for your own party members and nearby teammates. Healing scales based on Qiqi's ATK.
·Periodically regenerates your active character's HP.
·Follows the character around, dealing <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents in their path.
I use this to prevent warming and rot... of Dr. Bai's precious ingredients. Yes.

Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within her body, marking nearby opponents with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffd780>Fortune-Preserving Talisman</color>
When opponents affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP.
"I am the Fortune Preserver, the Maiden of Resurrection."
— Qiqi does not remember these words.
When a character under the effects of <color=#ffd780>Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost</color> triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.
When Qiqi hits opponents with her Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This effect can only occur once every 30s.
Displays the location of nearby <color=#ffd780>resources unique to Liyue</color> on the mini-map.

value.name: Yarınlar Olmasın
value.desc: Qiqi's specialty. The neat rows of ingredients seem at once exotic and delicious, and Baizhu says that Qiqi has spent a long time creating this dish. Still, once one considers that Qiqi has no sense of taste, just putting chopsticks to the food is going to take some courage.

desc.text:
The Five Kasen's Splendor: Sumizome
Going over his poetry, I found that the plagiarized piece did not have his scarlet seal.
I submerged the verses into clear water, and the truth did emerge.
The true verses were not washed away, but the text of that despicable crime faded.
Aoi no Okina passed me by, just as he was writing a verse for Akahito.
One storm had yet to settle, and it was already time to write new poems...
A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.
The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.
The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.
It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.
A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Summerchill Dreams
Qiqi's outfit. A herb gatherer's garment that brings her great peace of mind due to the attached talismans.

contents.text: スメールは草龍アペプの領地で、一面が青々と茂った雨林だった。やがて巨大な釘が天から降って来て、完全な砂漠に変わった。
マハールッカデヴァータ、アフマル、ナブ・マリカッタの同盟によって王権を共有。
ナブ・マリカッタが逝去。アフマルが禁忌の知識を手に入れる。
マハールッカデヴァータはアフマルと決別。
マハールッカデヴァータは自身の土地の砂漠を雨林に変え、砂漠と雨林の境界に防砂壁を創った。
キングデシェレト文明が禁忌の知識に汚染される。アフマルは自己犠牲を選び、マハールッカデヴァーカは旧友に協力して力を使い、幼子のような姿になる。
アフマルの国が滅んだとき、アペプはアフマルを飲み込み、元素力を吸収。アペプは禁忌の知識の苦しみに耐えかね、力尽きる。
他の七神がカーンルイアに向かう中、マハールッカデヴァータは世界樹を守るために命を落とす。最後に、自身を世界樹から抹消するため、ナヒーダを生み出す。
ナヒーダが現草神となるが、スラサタンナ聖処に五百年間幽閉される。
世界樹の禁忌の知識の汚染の影響が再度顕在化。旅人とナヒーダは、マハールッカデヴァータからのヒントを頼りに、彼女を世界樹から抹消することで解決する。
マハールッカデヴァータは人々の記憶から消える。また、「スメール全体を覆うほどの樹冠を持つ、天を突くような巨木がルッカデヴァータと呼ばれていた」という言い伝えが生まれた。
ナヒーダはアーカーシャの運行を止め、教令院の実権を握る。
禁忌の知識が消えたことで、禁忌の知識と適応していたアペプに巨大な穴が出来る。ナヒーダはアペプを救う。
